attributes.action: Eradicate the mandatory Covid-19 vaccine for nightclubs and large events
attributes.additional_details: No vaccine in the UK is mandatory, to enforce this on the public is stripping us of our basic human rights. A negative test should suffice, especially as 60% of those hospitalised with Covid-19 currently have the vaccine.
attributes.background: No restrictions on those who refuse the Covid-19 vaccine including travel, entry to nightclubs and large events, no Covid passports.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801

Do not mandate a vaccine passport for international travel to or from the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581401

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
